name: RemoveTaskDependents
description:
Unlink dependents from an Asana task.

Use this tool to unlink a set of dependents from a specific task in Asana. This is useful when you need to adjust task dependencies within your project management workflow.

parameters.name: task_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the task to operate on.

parameters.name: dependents_task_ids
parameters.description: An array of task GIDs that should be unlinked from the specified task.

value_schema.description: An array of task gids that are dependents of the given task.

parameters.name: enable_pretty_output
parameters.description: Set to true for prettified JSON output. Recommended only for debugging as it increases response size and time.

value_schema.description:
Provides “pretty” output.
Provides the response in a “pretty” format. In the case of JSON this means doing proper line breaking and indentation to make it readable. This will take extra time and increase the response size so it is advisable only to use this during debugging.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the asana API.

parameters.name: opt_pretty
parameters.description:
Provides “pretty” output.
Provides the response in a “pretty” format. In the case of JSON this means doing proper line breaking and indentation to make it readable. This will take extra time and increase the response size so it is advisable only to use this during debugging.

value_schema.description:

parameters.name: data.dependents
parameters.description: An array of task gids that are dependents of the given task.

value_schema.description: An array of task gids that are dependents of the given task.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
